meta_desc: Future web developper, young and passionate, I always try new things and make them interesting for myself as I create new projects. Please take a look around in this Portfolio.
index_main_subtitle: Future web developper situated in Angoulême.
index_about_text: I am currently studying in internet and multimedia technologies in Angoulême.
I started being interessed in coding with Discord bots, trying out Discord.js module. I quickly became passionate about it and made it my future.
At school I learned a lot of things, including better coding practices and a lot of new languages.

index_work_sect.title: Websites
index_work_sect.text: Here are some websites I have done during school or at home.

index_work_sect.title: Illustrations
index_work_sect.text: I learned Illustrator recently and fell for it, I really love doing infographics now.

index_hobbies_cards.title: Coding
index_hobbies_cards.text: Ever since I tried it, coding became my greatest passion

index_hobbies_cards.title: Design
index_hobbies_cards.text: I recently discovered that I love this, it relaxes me.

index_hobbies_cards.title: Gaming
index_hobbies_cards.text: I love playing games, but gamedesign is also very interesting.

index_skills_view_element.title: HTML / CSS
index_skills_view_element.content: I used these throughout a lot of project, without any framework, templates or preprocessor of any kind. Pure plain old HTML and CSS.

index_skills_view_element.title: Javascript
index_skills_view_element.content: My favorite language overall, JS is a thing I like to work with. Everything done on this site is hand-made with pure vanilla JS.

index_skills_view_element.title: PHP / SQL
index_skills_view_element.content: Mostly used in school, I know SQL basic concept. PHP on the other hand is also a language I love, because we can basically rule the web with it.

index_skills_view_element.title: Java
index_skills_view_element.content: I'm not that good with Java, I used it over 2020-2021 with Netbeans, but that's about it.

index_skills_view_element.title: Node.Js
index_skills_view_element.content: I used it a lot for creating some Discord bots, before I was good at coding.

index_skills_view_element.title: Illustrator
index_skills_view_element.content: I found myself fascinated by Illustrator, and used it a lot to create logos, infographics, and even some drawings !

index_skills_view_element.title: Photoshop
index_skills_view_element.content: During my youth, I NEEDED to know how to photoshop, because it was way too funny to see my teachers with pokeballs, trying to catch a pidgeon.

index_skills_view_element.title: Premiere Pro
index_skills_view_element.content: I used it for some time, to do funy montages on youtube. Most of them are now deleted, and I would not show those who remains.

index_skills_view_element.title: After Effects
index_skills_view_element.content: I'm quite a beginner but I roughly know the bases and can do basic animations.

index_skills_view_element.title: Excel
index_skills_view_element.content: I did more excel than I would like to admit, doing minmaxing for RPGs. I still have some sheets lying around, but most of these were temporary.

index_skills_view_element.title: Words
index_skills_view_element.content: Everyone needs to know words, and so do I. I can type quite fast, and am used to the interface.

index_contact_form_questions.text: What do you want to tell me ?
index_contact_form_questions.placeholder: Hey ! I like the background color !
